text: Neshchasnyy diysno shcho vony prodaly yikhni dushi dlya - vidkhylennya tsykh vidkryttiv BOHA z absolyutnoho oburennya shcho BOH musyt π podaruvaty Yoho charivnosti na whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv. Otzhe, vony zaznaly hnivu na hniv. disbelievers pidpaly prynyzhuyuchyy retribution
